citations.narrative:
A developed contingency plan was not available at time of inspection. Contingency plans help prepare facilities on how to
provide humane handling of animals during emergent events. The licensee must develop a complete contingency plan
tailored to the facility and animals on hand. All personnel must be trained on their roles and responsibilities within this plan
and the facility must maintain documentation thereof. The contingency plan must be reviewed and documented annually.
Correct by 17 May 2023 by developing a contingency plan.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
A developed contingency plan was not available at time of inspection. Contingency plans help prepare facilities on how to 
provide humane handling of animals during emergent events. The licensee must develop a complete contingency plan 
tailored to the facility and animals on hand. All personnel must be trained on their roles and responsibilities within this plan 
and the facility must maintain documentation thereof.   The contingency plan must be reviewed and documented annually. 
 
Correct by 17 May 2023 by developing a contingency plan. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee. 
 
 n
